constituent: third class, one, ceiling, inside, person, belt
heisigStory: Those no-frills flights the airlines offer to attract customers should help create an image from ceiling . . . person . . . belt. The kanji meaning "inside" should not be used because of its proximity to the element for "in."
koohiiStory1: In this third class flight, the seatbelts are so bad that with the slightest turbulence all the persons hit the ceiling. (it´s almost pictographic here!).
koohiiStory2: But third class is so small Mr. T´s head hits the celing.
